pages.title: Fire
pages.text: A turn ability that hhas a 50% chance to have the affected buddy lose 1 power or to clear the status effect.

pages.title: Sleep
pages.text: An attack ability that cancels the affected buddy's attack and clears the status effect.

pages.title: Strength
pages.text: An attack ability that gains the affected buddy 2 power and clears the status effect.

pages.title: Resistance
pages.text: A damaged ability that causes the affected buddy to gain 1 power whenever it takes damage. This can prevent its death in some situations.

pages.title: Regeneration
pages.text: A turn ability that causes the affected buddy to gain 1 power.

pages.title: Weakness
pages.text: An attack ability that loses the affected buddy 2 power and clears the status effect. It can die as this ability happens.

pages.title: Poison
pages.text: A turn ability that causes the affected buddy to lose 1 power. This ability won't trigger unless the buddy is at greater than 0 power.

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: A turn ability that causes the affected buddy to lose 1 power.

pages.title: Airborne
pages.text: An attack ability that cancels out its attack and replaces it with a direct attack to the opponent, before clearing the status effect.

pages.title: Stunned
pages.text: An attack ability that cancels out a defending attack and clears the status effect.
